## FunctionCallNode.validate() method

Validates the node state and input types

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected validate(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

Error message if invalid, empty string if valid

## Remarks

Ensures: - All required inputs are connected - Input types can be determined - Input types match the function's parameter types
